channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins rpmsign-plugin Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins rpmsign-plugin Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-36893|2024-08-03T10:14:29.472Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rpmsign-plugin%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins rpmsign-plugin Plugin 0.5.0 and earlier does not perform a permission check in a method implementing form validation, allowing attackers with Item/Read permission but without Item/Workspace or Item/Configure permission to check whether attacker-specified file patterns match workspace contents.
